entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of light snow after midnight. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow early in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
